Sequence Information.Peptide Name: B1CTcu4 (brevinin; natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals, UCLL1a)
Sequence Information.Source: skin secretions, the Indian bicoloured frog,Clinotarsus curtipes, Asia

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals that the sequence  is 95.8% similar toBrevinin-1Ba. Active against S. aureus MTCC 9542, B. subtilis  MTCC 14416 (MIC 25 ug/ml), VRE ATCC 29212 (MIC 25 ug/ml)  (anti-VRE), MRSA ATCC 43300 (MIC <6.25 ug/ml), Gram- E. coli MG1655 (20 ug/ml), and V. cholerae (25 ug/ml). Hemolytic 54.8%.
Literature Information.Author: Abraham P, George S, Kumar KS. 2014
Literature Information.Title: Novel antibacterial peptides from the skin secretion of the Indian bicoloured frog Clinotarsus curtipes.
